description: Indulge in the vibrant flavors of this Lemon Garlic Shrimp recipe that brings the taste of the sea right to your table. Perfectly cooked shrimp, infused with zesty lemon and aromatic garlic, make for a delightful dish that is both quick and satisfying.
instructions: Heat olive oil in large skillet over medium heat.
Add minced garlic and sauté for 1 minute until fragrant.
Add shrimp to the skillet and season with salt, pepper, lemon juice, and zest.
Cook shrimp for 2-3 minutes per side until they turn pink and opaque.
Remove from heat and garnish with fresh parsley before serving.
tips: For the best flavor, use fresh garlic and a ripe lemon. Don't overcook the shrimp to keep them tender and juicy.

structured_content.content: This Lemon Garlic Shrimp recipe is a quick and flavorful dish that brings together the bright zest of lemon and the aromatic essence of garlic. Perfect for a weeknight dinner or a special occasion, it showcases the natural sweetness of shrimp, making it a favorite among seafood lovers.

note.label: Why You'll Love This Recipe
note.content:
• Quick and easy to make in under 30 minutes
  • Restaurant-quality flavors at home
  • Perfect for weeknight dinners or entertaining
  • Uses simple ingredients you likely have on hand
  • Light and refreshing, perfect for warm weather

structured_content.content: I remember the first time I made this dish for my family; the aroma of garlic and lemon filled the kitchen, and everyone gathered around the table, eager to dig in. It quickly became a staple in our home, cherished for its simplicity and flavor.

• Main ingredient: Fresh shrimp work best for this recipe; look for shrimp that are firm and have a slight ocean scent.
  • Key seasonings/flavoring agents: Garlic adds depth, while lemon brightens the dish; use fresh for the best results.
  • Supporting ingredients: Olive oil helps in cooking and adds richness; parsley gives a fresh finish.
  • Equipment needed: A large skillet is essential for even cooking and easy flipping of the shrimp.

upload.context: Preparation of ingredients for Lemon Garlic Shrimp, showcasing shrimp, garlic, and lemon.

structured_content.content:
Preparation:
Start by peeling and deveining the shrimp if not already done. Mince the garlic and zest the lemon before juicing it.
Cooking/Baking Process:
Heat the olive oil in a skillet, sauté the garlic, then add the shrimp and seasonings. Cook until shrimp are pink and opaque.
Finishing Touches:
Garnish with chopped parsley and serve immediately for the best flavor.

upload.context: Cooking process of Lemon Garlic Shrimp, highlighting the sautéing of shrimp in the skillet.

note.label: You Must Know
note.content:
• Cook shrimp just until they turn pink to avoid rubbery texture.
  • Avoid overcrowding the skillet to ensure even cooking.
  • When shrimp curl into a 'C' shape, they are perfectly cooked.
  • Store leftovers in an airtight container in the fridge for up to 2 days.

structured_content.content: This dish is perfect for sharing with loved ones, and I often serve it with a side of crusty bread to soak up the delicious lemon-garlic sauce. It's a meal that brings everyone together, creating cherished memories around the dinner table.
For an extra kick, add red pepper flakes or a splash of white wine during cooking. Fresh herbs like basil or thyme can also elevate the flavors.
Serve this dish over a bed of rice or alongside a fresh salad. Pair it with a crisp white wine or a light beer for a refreshing meal.
For a gluten-free option, serve with quinoa instead of rice. You can also swap shrimp for scallops or chicken for a different protein experience.

upload.context: Final plated Lemon Garlic Shrimp dish, beautifully garnished and ready to serve.

note.label: Pro Tips
note.content:
• Use a high-quality olive oil for the best flavor.
  • Let the shrimp marinate in lemon juice for 15 minutes before cooking for extra zest.
  • Timing is key; have all ingredients prepped before starting to cook.
  • Serve immediately for the best texture and flavor.

structured_content.content: Don't be intimidated by cooking seafood; this Lemon Garlic Shrimp recipe is simple and rewarding. Enjoy the process and the delightful flavors that come together in just a short time!
